about_the_game:
Rise Again is an action RPG that combines elements of wizardry, roguelike gameplay, and dungeon crawling. Hack and slash your way through enemies in a medieval fantasy universe, transforming from a forgetful wizard into a skilled dungeon crawler as you progress through the game.

Spellbinding Adventure

Before you delivered the final blow, you fell victim to the Lich's curse. You can't remember anything before the curse. As you open your eyes, you find yourself in a mysterious realm with a Portal that resurrects the dead. Explore the new realm, uncover the truth behind resurrection, and overcome the challenges of this realm alongside others cursed like you!

Master the Art of Combat...

Enter the ever-changing dungeons to break free from the Lich's Curse, defeat the summoned creatures. Discover numerous spells and enhancements throughout your adventure. Experience unique battles.

Are you ready to Rise Again?

short_description: Rise Again is an Action Roguelike inspired by Hack n Slash and Dungeon Crawler. Witness the adventures of a cursed wizard in ever-changing dungeons. Kill, Die, and Rise Again to lift the curse. Every death is a step closer to freedom. Will you break the curse?
